reviewText: The CNA Training Solutions Videos: Orientation by HC ProThe CNA Training Solutions Videos: Orientation Great product. Simple, brief, and factual. Please coordinate the use of the video with your facility's policy and procedure for each topic. Video references CNA training but is a great training tool for all healthcare staff. The video was clear and a great time saver for review of standard orientation information and facility mandatory in-service. Video arrived as scheduled and free of shipping damage.
